document_data.name: ''Buzuq''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''buzuq''''' ({{Pronounce|buh|ZOOK}}) was a stringed [[Zakhara]]n instrument that was comparable to an elongated [[lute]].{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.Description: The ''buzuq's'' metallic strings were stretched over a long fretted neck connected to a wider, nearly circular body.
document_data.History: The ''buzuq'' was one of the favored musical instruments of the wandering tribes of [[Al-Badia]], particularly in the southern regions of the Land of Fate.
